description: Descubre los mejores hoteles en Mie, Japan. Encuentra ofertas exclusivas y alojamientos de lujo.

hotels.title: Sophisticated Japanese Cultural Retreat with Pools & Relaxing Onsen Experience
hotels.description: Discover the stories of ancient Japan in Ise-shima, where history, relaxation and culture intertwine. Overlooking the breathtaking Matoya Bay and the Ria coastline, this retreat in Mie Prefecture offers a tranquil haven, surrounded by the natural beauty of the Ise-Shima National Park. Famous for being the base for Japan's most sacred shrines, it is a perfect for an escape seeking culture in a beautiful resort. After exploring the lush and historic surrounds, take in gorgeous views of the bay and mountains from the comfort of your room. Spend your days swimming in the resort's seasonal garden pool and indulge in a stunning onsen experience by soaking in the open-air and indoor baths and hot springs. Enjoy a vast array of seasonal flavours at the onsite restaurant, including locally sourced seafood and hand-crafted cocktails in a sophisticated atmosphere, elevating your elegant stay.

seo.title: Hoteles en Mie - Japan Hotels & Travel Guide 2024
seo.description: Encuentra los mejores hoteles en Mie, Japan con ofertas exclusivas. Reserva tu escapada perfecta con hasta 60% de descuento.
